DOC.brief_summary: This study compares the safety and efficacy of GDTs using standard pressure-related parameters vs. dynamic hemodynamic indices associated with fluid compartment monitoring, in trauma patients requiring emergency surgery.
DOC.brief_title: Impact of Early Goal-directed Fluid Therapy in Hypovolemic Patients Undergoing Emergency Surgery
